detail_desc: Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long, wide dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a frilled collar with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Set with wings and a skirt. Lightly padded, glittery wings with elastic shoulder straps. Skirt in a double layer of tulle with a glittery elasticated waist and frill-trim at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jersey T-shirt with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey T-shirt with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative gathers at the front.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, a low-cut back and padded cups.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, a low-cut back and padded cups.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Leggings in glossy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and elasticated foot straps.
Leggings in glossy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and elasticated foot straps.
Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in stretch viscose jersey with a seam at the waist with a decorative knot details and draped wrapover skirt. Lined.

Push-up microfibre bra with decorative straps and a metal ring at the front, and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Gentle lift.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative metal rings, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Imitation suede ankle boots with square toes, a zip in one side and decorative strap with a metal buckle. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 7 cm.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in puff pants with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in bow at the front and elastication at the back of the neck.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in puff pants with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in bow at the front and elastication at the back of the neck.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt with details. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt with details. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and press-studs at the crotch.
Bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and press-studs at the crotch.

Short-sleeved romper suit in organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the shoulders and a small print motif at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, long legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Short jersey top with inset mesh sections at the top and long sleeves.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Satin top with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with a transparent section at the front and narrow, horizontal straps at the back. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and pin-tucks at the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back of the neck.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a wide neckline with a drawstring and tie. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a wide neckline with a drawstring and tie. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a key pocket in the waistband.

Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacquard-knit sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small collar and zip down the front. Seamless.
Cotton poplin blouse with a collar, V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist, and buttoned cuffs.
Quilted, lightly padded jacket in a jacquard weave with a small stand-up collar, frog buttons down the front, chest pockets and slits in the sides. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back and straight, wide legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard weave containing some wool with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and flared legs with creases.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an inner bodysuit. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch.
